instructions: Identify common safety equipment visible in the video. Use the provided labels.

objects.label: Hard Hat
objects.description: Safety helmet worn on the head.

objects.label: High-Visibility Vest/Jacket
objects.description: Brightly colored (e.g., yellow, orange, lime green) safety vest or jacket.

objects.label: Work Boots
objects.description: Sturdy footwear appropriate for a worksite.

objects.label: Tool
objects.description: Any handheld instrument being used for work (e.g., hammer, shovel, drill).
